channel.title: ggmap on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in ggmap on Mark Needham

item.title: R: ggmap - Overlay shapefile with filled polygon of regions
item.description: > library(ggmap) > sfMap = map = get_map(location = 'San Francisco', zoom = 12) > library(rgdal) > library(ggplot2) > sfn = readOGR(".","sfzipcodes") %>% spTransform(CRS("+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84")) > ggplot(data = sfn, aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group)) + geom_path() > class(sfn) [1] "SpatialPolygonsDataFrame" attr(,"package") [1] "sp" > names(sfn) [1] "OBJECTID" "ZIP_CODE" "ID" > sfn.f = sfn %>% fortify(region = 'ZIP_CODE') SFNeighbourhoods = merge(sfn.f, sfn@data, by.x = 'id', by.y = 'ZIP_CODE') > library(dplyr) > postcodes = SFNeighbourhoods %>% select(id) %>% distinct() > values = data.
